title: Marketing Analytics Tools Overview - Spring 2020
excerpt: Software verified by small business owners to help you get the most from your marketing spend.
content:
Call tracking software
		
			Best for
			Tracking the effectiveness of online and offline marketing campaigns with unique phone numbers.
		
		
			Industries
			Home services (plumbers, painters, landscapers, cleaning services, flooring, contractors), Legal (Attorneys), Real Estate (Real Estate Agent/Broker, Appraiser, Home Inspection), Automotive (Car Dealership, Automobile Service/Repair)
		
	

	
	
		
CallRail - Tracking and analytics for phone calls and web forms


	
	
	
	
		
		
			Summary: With CallRail you can discover which ads, keywords, and campaigns bring valuable leads over the phone and on the web.
		
	
	
		Learn More
	


		

	
		Price
		As low as $45/mo
		Billing options
		Monthly

		
			Ratings
			4.6 stars - G2 | 4.6 stars - Capterra | 4.5 stars - Trustpilot
		
		
	

	
		Customer support
		Includes Knowledgebase, Email, Phone
		Free trial available
		Free 14-day trial | No credit card required

		
		
			Popular integrations
			Google Ads, Facebook, Zapier, Unbounce, Mixpanel, Hubspot
		
		
	




Additional Info

	In your offline advertisements, you can place a unique phone number on billboards, work trucks, and anywhere else you do business. You will then get detailed information on the phone leads originating from those offline advertisements so you can track conversion rates for your ads.






	Visit CallRail to Learn More



	

	
	
		
WhatConverts - Get marketing clarity


	
	
	
	
		
		
			Summary: WhatConverts automatically shows marketers and business owners how well their marketing is working.
		
	
	
		Learn More
	


		

	
		Price
		As low as $30/mo
		Billing options
		Monthly

		
			Ratings
			5.0 stars - G2 | 4.9 stars - Capterra | 4.5 stars - Trustpilot
		
		
	

	
		Customer support
		Includes Email, Phone, Chat - Premium plans offer upgraded support features
		Free trial available
		Free 14-day trial

		
		
			Popular integrations
			Google Analytics, Google AdWords, Unbounce, Wordpress, Zapier
		
		
	




Additional Info

	Start tracking calls and clicks, and get a clear idea of how your customers get in touch with your business. With WhatConverts you can make sense of your small business marketing.






	Visit WhatConverts to Learn More



	



	
	
		Marketing Analytics Dashboard
		
			Best for
			Consolidating all your marketing data in one automated report.
		
		
			Industries
			Any business that does any form of online marketing
		
	

	
	
		
DashThis


	
	
	
	
		
		
			Summary: DashThis makes it easy to track all your small business' online marketing efforts: all your business performance data is in one dashboard and it's super simple to set up and use.
		
	
	
		Learn More
	


		

	
		Price
		As low as $33/mo
		Billing options
		Monthly | Yearly

		
			Ratings
			4.8 stars - G2 | 4.5 stars - Capterra
		
		
	

	
		Customer support
		Includes dedicated Product Specialist
		Free trial available
		Free 15-day trial | No credit card required

		
		
			Popular integrations
			Google Ads, Google My Business, Facebook, Instagram, Mailchimp
		
		
	




Additional Info

	Consolidating all your marketing data in one automated report.






	Visit DashThis to Learn More



	

	
	
		
Visitor Analytics - The All-in-One Analytics App


	
	
	
	
		
		
			Summary: Visitor Analytics provides everything you need to understand website traffic, user behavior, customer needs & feedback!
		
	
	
		Learn More
	


		

	
		Price
		As low as $0/mo
		Billing options
		Monthly | Yearly

		
			Ratings
			4.6 stars - G2 | 4.8 stars - Capterra
		
		
	

	
		Customer support
		Includes Knowledgebase, Email
		Free trial available
		Free plan available

		
		
			Popular integrations
			Weebly, Wix, GoDaddy, WordPress, Jimdo, Squarespace, Shopify
		
		
	




Additional Info

	With more than 2M installs from 190 countries and offering an all-in-one solution for any website in regards to website statistics, user behavior analytics and visitor interaction, Visitor Analytics is one of the leading online tools worldwide.






	Visit Visitor Analytics to Learn More



	

	
	
		
Whatagraph - The most visual multi-source reports for every brand


	
	
	
	
		
		
			Summary: All the key analytics integrations and ready-made report templates to simplify your daily marketing reporting tasks.
		
	
	
		Learn More
	


		

	
		Price
		As low as $99/mo
		Billing options
		Quarterly | Yearly

		
			Ratings
			4.4 stars - G2 | 4.5 stars - Capterra
		
		
	

	
		Customer support
		Includes Email - Premium plans offer upgraded support features
		Free trial available
		Free 7-day trial

		
		
			Popular integrations
			Google Analytics, Google Ads, Google My Business, Instagram, Mailchimp, Snapchat
		
		
	




Additional Info

	Made for agencies, Loved by businesses - We’re an irreplaceable reporting tool that’s often used in a company for social media, organic search, and other digital marketing reporting.






	Visit Whatagraph to Learn More



	


For this article, we researched over 50 product company websites for helping businesses solve marketing spend problems with marketing analytics software and we included these 5 tools (CallRail, DashThis, VisitorAnalytics, WhatConverts, Whatagraph) based on several criteria:

1) How transparent was their pricing 2) How affordable their plans are 3) How clear was their messaging about what problems they solve 4) What levels of technical support they offered 5) The quantity and quality of reviews they received on sites like G2 and Capterra.

At the time of publishing this article, smallbiztechpros.com does not have any affiliation with the companies listed and were chosen solely on the criteria set previously.

title: Search
excerpt: Search for a page or post you’re looking for
